name: Cookies ‘n’ Cream Ice Cream Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: heavy cream, condensed milk, chocolate sandwich cookie
recipeIngredient: 12 chocolate sandwich cookies, crumbled (additional cookies for topping if desired)
recipeInstructionSteps: In a large bowl, add the cream and condensed milk, then whip until soft peaks form.
Add the cookies and gently fold to combine.
Transfer mixture to a baking pan. Top with additional cookies if desired, then freeze for 3-4 hours.
